name: S&S 30 (SWARBRICK)
notes:
S&S design #1999-C1
Similar to the YANKEE 30, built by Yankee Yachts of US (S&S design No. 1999).
Not to be confused with a later S&S 30 aka AQUA 30, (S&S design #2014) built by Aquafibre Ltd. UK.

#1999 as it differs from #2014:
Shorter cockpit, shorter saloon,longer forepeak area, no quarter berth,
less freeboard, narrower transom, has bustle, shallower draft, prop just aft of the keel.
There was yet another later S&S 30 footer. (#2098 aka NORTHSTAR 1000)
Thanks to Owen McCall, PJ-30 owner, for supplying information on the different versions of the S&S 30.
